com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Class WTable.ActionConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.WTable.ActionConstraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    WTable

    public static final class WTable.ActionConstraint
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Describes a constraint on a table action.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jonathan Austin

    • Constructor Detail

      • WTable.ActionConstraint

        public WTable.ActionConstraint(int minSelectedRowCount,
                       int maxSelectedRowCount,
                       boolean error,
                       String message)
        Creates an action constraint.
        Parameters:
        minSelectedRowCount - the minimum number of rows which must be selected to fulfil the constraint, or zero for any number of rows.
        maxSelectedRowCount - the maximum number of rows which can be selected to fulfil the constraint, or zero for any number of rows.
        error - true if the constraint is an error, false for a warning.
        message - the message to display when the constraint is not met.
